--- title: Count Tree keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A tree data structure to count circuit and subset selections during protocol sampling." description: "A tree data structure to count circuit and subset selections during protocol sampling." nb_path: "06a_sampler.tree.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This data structure is based on the Python package anytree (https://github.com/c0fec0de/anytree) which has been extended by the classes Constant, Variable and CountTree.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Node[source]

Node(name, parent=None, children=None) :: NodeMixin

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Variable[source]

Variable(name, parent=None, counts=0, marked=False, **kwargs) :: Node

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Constant[source]

Constant(name, parent=None, cid=None, counts=0, is_deterministic=False, **kwargs) :: Node

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class CountTree[source]

CountTree(constants=None, min_path_weight=1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
